Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Pulaski.
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Elston, Montrose and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Pulaski.
